metadata.title: CVE-2023-3300 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 0.11.0 up to 1.5.6 and 1.4.1 HTTPsearch API can reveal names of available CSI plugins to unauthenticatedusers or users without the plugin:read policy. Fixed in 1.6.0, 1.5.7, and1.4.1.

criterions.comment: nomad package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
